analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS: 41 (Neutral). Momentum pushed the score to 41, exiting the Defensive zone. DXY (Dollar strength) at 96.58 and VIX (Volatility) at 17.76 suggest stabilizing liquidity. However, AI-driven weakness in software/finance warns of instability. Gold's rise flags hedge demand. Action: Hold neutral. Monitor if score holds above 40 before increasing risk, as sector rotation away from AI-disrupted industries continues.

reports.EN: GMS: 41 (Neutral). Momentum pushed the score to 41, exiting the Defensive zone. DXY (Dollar strength) at 96.58 and VIX (Volatility) at 17.76 suggest stabilizing liquidity. However, AI-driven weakness in software/finance warns of instability. Gold's rise flags hedge demand. Action: Hold neutral. Monitor if score holds above 40 before increasing risk, as sector rotation away from AI-disrupted industries continues.
reports.ES: GMS: 41 (Neutral). El impulso empujÃ³ el puntaje a 41, saliendo de la zona defensiva. El DXY (fuerza del dÃ³lar) bajÃ³ a 96.58 y el VIX (miedo/volatilidad) se estabilizÃ³ en 17.76, mejorando la liquidez. No obstante, la amenaza de la IA sobre el software y las finanzas genera volatilidad sectorial. El auge del oro sugiere coberturas preventivas. AcciÃ³n: Mantener postura neutral. Observar si el puntaje se consolida sobre 40 antes de ampliar el riesgo en activos cÃ­clicos.

reports.ID: GMS: 41 (Netral). Momentum mendorong skor ke 41, beralih dari zona Defensif. Penurunan DXY (kekuatan Dolar) ke 96,58 dan stabilnya VIX (Indeks Ketakutan) di 17,76 menunjukkan perbaikan likuiditas global. Namun, disrupsi AI pada sektor perangkat lunak dan keuangan menjadi hambatan utama. Kenaikan harga emas menandakan adanya lindung nilai yang kuat. Kesimpulan: Pertahankan sikap netral. Pantau apakah skor mampu bertahan di atas 40 sebelum menambah paparan risiko aset.

reports.DE: GMS: 41 (Neutral). Das Momentum schob den Score auf 41, womit die defensive Zone verlassen wurde. Ein sinkender DXY (DollarstÃ¤rke/LiquiditÃ¤t) bei 96,58 und ein stabiler VIX (Angstindex) bei 17,76 signalisieren leichte Entspannung. Dennoch belasten AI-Sorgen die Software- und Finanzwerte erheblich. Der Anstieg von Gold zeigt eine anhaltende Absicherungslust. Fazit: Neutral bleiben. Beobachten Sie, ob sich der Score stabil Ã¼ber 40 hÃ¤lt, bevor das Risiko erhÃ¶ht wird.

La baisse du DXY (force du Dollar) Ã  96,58 et la stabilitÃ© du VIX (indice de peur) Ã  17,76 suggÃ¨rent une amÃ©lioration de la liquiditÃ©.
